messages.message:
@sean.donohoe @Dave It looks like crafting is not included in the base engineer okta permissions.

@Sayan Does not have access to crafting.
Hi Victor, crafting access is by request through an <mailto:ithelp@instabase.com|ithelp@instabase.com> ticket
@Sayan drop in a ticket to <mailto:ithelp@instabase.com|ithelp@instabase.com> and we'll get it all setup :+1:
Is there any reason engineers don't have it by default?
I don't have context on that here in the approvals list, so I'll defer that to Sean as the app owner.

Pretty sure we requested default access to all engineers months ago :slightly_smiling_face: I would follow up with `<mailto:ithelp@instabase.com|ithelp@instabase.com>` to help identify why Sayan does not seem to fall into this group
@sean.donohoe we don't currently have the rule in place, could I just have you drop in a ticket requesting that and I'll get it sorted now
News to me :slightly_smiling_face: Will file a ticket in a couple minutes
Sean and I circled up, it's a birthright app for dept-engineering now
